episodes.plot: The Dutton family embarks westward through the last bastion of untamed America. James arrives in Texas, where he and his family prepare to make their way through The Great Plains in search of a new home and the promise of opportunity.

episodes.title: Behind Us, a Cliff
episodes.plot: Thomas and Shea recruit James and some local cowboys to corral a herd of cattle. As they begin their journey, the caravan is confronted with some of the many dangers they will face along the way.

episodes.title: River
episodes.plot: James butts heads with Shea and Thomas about an important decision. Tensions rise in camp when an accusation is made. Elsa begins a flirtation with a cowboy.

episodes.title: The Crossing
episodes.plot: The group faces the harrowing task of crossing the river with their wagons and supplies. Thomas and Noemi grow closer.

episodes.title: The Fangs of Freedom
episodes.plot: Shea and Thomas cope with the aftermath of the river crossing, but there is little time to grieve and no shortage of challenges ahead. Elsa and Ennis share a romantic moment.

episodes.title: Boring the Devil
episodes.plot: Shea helps Elsa cope with her loss. The group crosses another river and prepares to enter Indian territory. Thomas buys Noemi a gift.

episodes.title: Lightning Yellow Hair
episodes.plot: Elsa makes an unlikely friend; the group faces a harrowing challenge from mother nature; the camp searches for one of their own.

episodes.title: The Weep of Surrender
episodes.plot: Elsa makes a big decision. Shea faces doubts as winter looms.

episodes.title: Racing Clouds
episodes.plot: A misunderstanding leads to a battle with serious consequences.

episodes.title: This Is Not Your Heaven
episodes.plot: James and Margaret face a heavy decision. Shea and Thomas take bold action to help one of their own.
